aka: Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve with Ryan Seacrest Season 51

cast.name: 瑞安·西克莱斯特 Ryan Seacrest
菲尼亚斯·奥康奈尔 Finneas O'Connell

this_title: Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve with Ryan Seacrest 2023
trans_title: Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve with Ryan Seacrest Season 51
introduction: 今年迎来第51届的《New Year's Rockin' Eve》，每年在纽约时代广场、迪斯尼乐园、洛杉矶、新奥尔良等美国代表性场所举行。这一美国代表性的新年前夜活动《New Year's Rockin' Eve》于每年最后一天12月31日晚开始播出，与全世界观众一起迎接新年第一天。The annual broadcast is celebrating its 51-st anniversary this year and has events scheduled across the country. Of course, Ryan Seacrest is back to host from Times Square in New York City. There are also live events in New Orleans, Los Angeles and Puerto Rico and a pre-taped event at Disneyland.New York City Performers:· Duran Duran (Medley)· New Edition (“Rub You The Right Way,” “My Prerogative,” “Poison,” “If It Isn’t Love” and “Cool It Now”)· J-Hope of BTS (“=,” “Chicken Noodle Soup” and “Butter (Holiday Remix)”)· Jax (“Victoria’s Secret” and “90s Kids”)Los Angeles Performers:· Wiz Khalifa (“Memory Lane” and “Black & Yellow”)· FINNEAS (“Let’s Fall in Love for the Night” and “Only a Lifetime”)· Armani White (“Billie Eilish” and “Goated”)· Betty Who (“Blow Out My Candle” and a cover of Kate Bush‘s “Running Up That Hill”)· Dove Cameron (“Boyfriend” and “Bad Idea”)· Nicky Youre (“Sunroof” and “Eyes On You”)New Orleans Performers:· Billy Porter (Medley)Puerto Rico Performers:· FarrukoDisneyland Resort Performers (pre-taped):· Ciara (“Better Thangs” and “Jump” medley)· Fitz and the Tantrums (“Sway” and “HandClap”)· Maddie & Tae (“Bathroom Floor” and “Every Night Every Morning”)· Shaggy (“Boombastic” and “Angel,” featuring Olaf Blackwood)· Ben Platt (“Imagine,” Go Your Own Way with Aly & AJ)· Halle Bailey (“Cool People” and a cover of Janet Jackson’s “Together Again”)· TOMORROW X TOGETHER (TXT) (“Good Boy Gone Bad” and “0X1=LOVESONG (I Know I Love You)” featuring Seori)· Bailey Zimmerman (“Fall In Love” and “Rock And A Hard Place”)· Lauren Spencer Smith (“Fingers Crossed” and “Flowers”)
chinese_title: Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve with Ryan Seacrest 2023
